==Story==
{{VO/Story
|character           = {{ROOTPAGENAME}}
|language            = ja
|name                = 楓原万葉

|vo_01_01_title      = 初めまして…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 「雨ふる風の中、刀を持ちて裸足で歩く」…拙者は楓原万葉と申す。四方を彷徨う浪人でござる。同じ旅路をゆく者同士、共に歩もうではないか。
|vo_01_01_rm         = "Ame furu kaze no naka, katana wo mochite hadashi de aruku" ...Sessha wa Kaedehara Kazuha to mousu. Shihou wo samayou rounin de gozaru. Onaji tabiji wo yuku mono doushi, tomo ni ayumou de wa nai ka.
|vo_01_01_tl         = "Through the wind and rain, I will walk barefoot with my katana" ... I am called Kazuha Kaedahara. A wandering warrior who roams in all directions. Fellow traveler on the same journey, shall we not walk together?

|vo_02_01_title      = 世間話・自然
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Nature
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Nature.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = これほど美しき景色を見れば、自ずと旅がしたくなるものであろう？
|vo_02_01_rm         = Kore hodo utsukushiki keshiki wo mireba, onozuto tabi ga shitaku naru mono de arou?
|vo_02_01_tl         = When you see sights as beautiful as this, don't you naturally want to journey?
|vo_02_02_title      = 世間話・草笛
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Playing a Tune
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Playing a Tune.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = 手元に葉があるのなら、拙者が草笛で一曲奏でよう。
|vo_02_02_rm         = Temoto ni ha ga aru no nara, sessha ga kusabue de ikkyoku kanadeyou.
|vo_02_02_tl         = If there is a leaf at hand, let's play a tune on the reed pipe.
|vo_02_03_title      = 世間話・剣技
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Bladework
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Bladework.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = 雨ふる風の中、ふるさとを思う…拙者と故郷のつながりは…もうこの刀のみでござる。
|vo_02_03_rm         = Ame furu kaze no naka, furusato wo omou... Sessha to kokyou no tsunagari wa... mou kono katana nomi de gozaru.
|vo_02_03_tl         = In the rain and wind I think of my hometown... my connection with my hometown... is now nothing but this katana.

|vo_03_01_title      = 雨の日…
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = 大雨の中を歩けば、精神が研ぎ澄まされる。しかし雨が止んだあとは、急いで服を乾かした方がよいでござるな。
|vo_03_01_rm         = Ooame no naka wo arukeba, seishin ga togisumaseru. Shikashi ame ga yanda ato wa, isoide fuku wo kawakashita hou ga yoi de gozaru na.
|vo_03_01_tl         = When walking in a downpour, the mind is sharpened. However when the rain has stopped you should hurry to dry your clothes.
|vo_03_02_title      = 雷の日…
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = 海を渡る時の雷雨と比べれば、この程度は意にも介さぬ。
|vo_03_02_rm         = Umi wo wataru toki no raiu to kurabereba, kono teido wa i ni mo kaisanu.
|vo_03_02_tl         = When compared to the thunderstorms when crossing the seas, this is of no consquence.
|vo_03_03_title      = 雪の日…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When It Snows
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = 雪は好きでござる。雪が降った後の世界は静かで、誰にも夢を邪魔されずに済む。
|vo_03_03_rm         = Yuki wa suki de gozaru. Yuki ga futta ato no sekai wa shizuka de, dare ni mo yume wo jama sarezu ni sumu.
|vo_03_03_tl         = I like the snow. After snowfall the world is silent, no one will disturb your dreams.
|vo_03_04_title      = 晴れの日…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When the Sun Is Out
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Sun Is Out.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = 雲一つなし、実に心地好い晴天よ。
|vo_03_04_rm         = Kumo hitotsu nashi, jitsu ni kokochi yoi seiten yo.
|vo_03_04_tl         = Not a cloud in the sky, it really is nice weather.

|vo_04_01_title      = おはよう…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = 早朝に聞こえる鳥のさえずり、大自然からの恵みでござるな。<br />さあ、参ろう。拙者たちの旅路も始まるでござるよ。
|vo_04_01_rm         = Souchou ni kikoeru tori no saezuri, Daishizen kara no megumi de gozaru na.<br />Saa, mairou. Sessha-tachi no tabiji mo hajimaru de gozaru yo.
|vo_04_01_tl         = The chirping of the early morning birds, are a blessing from nature.<br />Well shall we go, our journey has begun.
|vo_04_02_title      = こんにちは…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = 正午の日差しは、居眠りをしてしまいたくなるほど心地好い。休む場所を探してみてはどうでござるか？
|vo_04_02_rm         = Shougo no hizashi wa, inemuri wo shite shimaitaku naru hodo kokochi yoi. Yasumu basho wo sagashite mite wa dou de gozaru ka?
|vo_04_02_tl         = The mid-day sun is comfortable and I end up feeling drowsy. How about we look for a place to rest?
|vo_04_03_title      = こんばんは…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = 上に見えるは月、耳に聞こえるは風、杯にあるは酒、心にあるは安らぎ…<br />ご機嫌いかがでござるか。
|vo_04_03_rm         = Ue ni mieru wa tsuki, mimi ni kikoeru wa kaze, sakazuki ni aru wa sake, kokoro ni aru wa yasuragi...<br />Gokigen ikaga de gozaru ka.
|vo_04_03_tl         = Looking up you see the moon, listening with your ears you hear the wind, in your cup is sake, in your heart is tranquility...<br />How's the mood?
|vo_04_04_title      = おやすみ…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = 風が止んだ…<br />静かな世界、休むのに最適であるな。では、また明日。
|vo_04_04_rm         = Kaze ga yanda...<br />Shizuka na sekai, yasumu no ni saiteki de aru na. De wa, mata asu.
|vo_04_04_tl         = The wind stopped...<br />the world is silent, it would be best to rest. Well see you tommorow.

|vo_05_01_title      = 楓原万葉自身について・航行
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About Kaedehara Kazuha: Sailing
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Sailing.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = 実は、大海も毎日が荒波というわけではないのでござる。天気がよい日は、月光が海面を揺れ、魚群が船の周りを泳ぐ。船首から遠くを眺めれば、この旅も価値のあるものだと思える…唯一残念なのは、船員の歌声がうるさいことでござるな。あやつらは眠らなくても平気なのであろうか？
|vo_05_01_rm         = Jitsu wa, taikai mo mainichi ga aranami to iu wake de wa nai no de gozaru. Tenki ga yoi hi wa, gekkou ga kaimen wo yure, gyogun ga fune no mawari wo oyogu. Senshu kara tooku wo nagamereba, kono tabi mo kachi no aru mono da to omoeru... yuiitsu zannen na no wa, sen'in no utagoe ga urusai koto de gozaru na. Ayatsura wa nemuranakute mo heiki na no de arou ka?
|vo_05_01_tl         = The truth is the sea was not raging waves everyday. On a fair weather day the moon would flicker on the water and fish would swim around the ship. If you watch from the bow I think this journey is also of value... the only issue is that the sailors singing voices are all obnoxious. Are those guys really alright even though they don't sleep?
|vo_05_02_title      = 楓原万葉自身について・武家
|vo_05_02_subtitle   = About Kaedehara Kazuha: Samurai Nobility
|vo_05_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Samurai Nobility.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx         = 楓原家はかつて有名な武士の家系であったが、拙者が跡を継いだ時にはすでに、武家の名以外は意味のないものとなっていた。しかし拙者からすれば、それくらいがちょうどよい。武士に裕福な生活などいらぬ。拙者たちに必要なのは詩歌と美酒、そして手中にある刀のみでござるよ。
|vo_05_02_rm         = Kaedehara-ke wa katsute yuumei na bushi no kakei de atta ga, sessha ga ato wo tsuida toki ni wa sude ni, buke no na igai wa imi no nai mono to natte ita. Shikashi sessha kara sureba, sore kurai ga choudo yoi. Bushi ni yuufuku na seikatsu nado iranu. Sessha-tachi ni hitsuyou na no wa shiika to bishu, soshite shuchuu ni aru katana nomi de gozaru yo.
|vo_05_02_tl         = The Kaedehara clan was once a famous samurai bloodline, when it was time for me to inherit the techniques we were samurai in name only. However that was just fine for me. I have no need for the wealthy life of a samurai. What we need is poetry, good sake, and the sword in my hand.
|vo_05_03_title      = 楓原万葉を知る・1
|vo_05_03_subtitle   = About Kaedehara Kazuha: I
|vo_05_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_05_03_tx         = 拙者のことを知りたいのか？見ての通り、どこにでもいる流浪武士でござるよ。
|vo_05_03_rm         = Sessha no koto wo shiritai no ka? Mite no toori, doko ni de mo iru rurou bushi de gozaru yo.
|vo_05_03_tl         = You want to get to know me? It's just what it looks like, I'm a wandering warrior no matter where I go.
|vo_05_04_title      = 楓原万葉を知る・2
|vo_05_04_subtitle   = About Kaedehara Kazuha: II
|vo_05_04_friendship = 3
|vo_05_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_05_04_tx         = 拙者は耳が優れていて、様々な音が聞こえる。例えば風が山を越える音、雲が散りゆく音、森で小狐がリンゴをかじる音、カニが泡を吹く音…これは自然と万物が拙者に与えた恩恵、いつでも危険を事前に察知することができるでござる。
|vo_05_04_rm         = Sessha wa mimi ga sugurete ite, samazama na oto ga kikoeru. Tatoeba kaze ga yama wo koeru oto, kumo ga chiriyuku oto, mori de kogitsune ga ringo wo kajiru oto, kani ga awa wo fuku oto... kore wa shizen to banbutsu ga sessha ni ataeta onkei, itsu de mo kiken wo jizen ni sacchi suru koto ga dekiru de gozaru.
|vo_05_04_tl         = My ears are quite good, I can hear all sorts of things. For example the sound of wind cross the mountains, the sound of clouds dispersing, the sounds of fox kits nibbling apples in the forest, the sound of crabs blowing bubbles... with this I am blessed with nature and all things, I can always sense danger before it arrives.
|vo_05_05_title      = 楓原万葉を知る・3
|vo_05_05_subtitle   = About Kaedehara Kazuha: III
|vo_05_05_friendship = 4
|vo_05_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_05_05_tx         = 小さい頃は雨が好きであった。あのザァザァとした音を聞くと心地好い夢を見る。しかし今となっては、雨に対する感情も複雑になったでござる…雨の音は今も好きなのだが、黒雲を見かけた時は「今日、泊まらせてくれる心優しき方はいるであろうか」と心配になってしまう。濡れた服で雨の音を聞いても、くしゃみで雰囲気が壊されてしまうでござるよ。
|vo_05_05_rm         = Chiisai koro wa ame ga suki de atta. Ano zaazaa to shita oto wo kiku to kokochi yoi yume wo miru. Shikashi ima to natte wa, ame ni taisuru kanjou mo fukuzatsu ni natta de gozaru... Ame no oto wa ima mo suki na no da ga, kokuun wo mikaketa toki wa "kyou, tomarasete kureru kokoro yasashiki kata wa iru de arou ka" to shinpai ni natte shimau. Nureta fuku de ame no oto wo kiite mo, kushami de fun'iki ga kowasarete shimau de gozaru yo.
|vo_05_05_tl         = When I was little I liked the rain. I had pleasant dreams listening to the rain pour. However now my feeling toward rain have become more complex...I still like the sound of rain, but when I happen to see dark clouds I end up worrying "Is there a kind hearted person who'll let me stay over today?". When listening to the rain in wet clothes, sneezing ruins the mood.
|vo_05_06_title      = 楓原万葉を知る・4
|vo_05_06_subtitle   = About Kaedehara Kazuha: IV
|vo_05_06_friendship = 5
|vo_05_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_05_06_tx         = 拙者はあまり同じ場所には滞在しないでござる。長く滞在すれば「自然」との間に隔たりが生じ、刀が鈍ってしまう。遠くへゆける今のうちに、様々な場所にゆき、色々な人に会ってみたいでござるな。
|vo_05_06_rm         = Sessha wa amari onaji basho ni wa taizai shinai de gozaru. Nagaku taizai sureba "shizen" to no aida ni hedatari ga shouji, katana ga namatte shimau. Tooku he yukeru ima no uchi ni, samazama na basho ni yuki, iroiro na hito ni atte mitai de gozaru na.
|vo_05_06_tl         = I don't really stay in one place. If you stay to long you start to lose touch with 'nature' and your blade dulls. Now that I can travel far I'd like to see lots of places and meet lots of people.
|vo_05_07_title      = 楓原万葉を知る・5
|vo_05_07_subtitle   = About Kaedehara Kazuha: V
|vo_05_07_friendship = 6
|vo_05_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_05_07_tx         = 心配はいらぬ、いつの日かお互い違う場所に赴こうとも、必ず世界のどこかでまた会えよう。人の「縁」とは、そう容易く切れるものではないのでござる。
|vo_05_07_rm         = Shinpai wa iranu, itsu no hi ka otagai chigau basho ni omomukou to mo, kanarazu sekai no dokoka de mata aeyou. Hito no "enishi" to wa, sou tayasuku kireru mono de wa nai no de gozaru.
|vo_05_07_tl         = There is no need for worry, even if we part ways we will surely meet again somewhere in this world. A persons 'fate' is not easily severed.

|vo_06_01_title      = 出航について…
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Going Out to Sea
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Going Out to Sea.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = 天気のよい日は、海に行ってみてはどうでござるか？
|vo_06_01_rm         = Tenki no yoi hi wa, umi ni itte mite wa dou de gozaru ka?
|vo_06_01_tl         = Someday when the weather is nice why don't we travel the sea
|vo_06_02_title      = 本音について…
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Frank Speech
|vo_06_02_friendship = 6
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Frank Speech.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 拙者は飾り気のない性格をした人が好きでござる。やはり、思っていることは心の内に秘めず、直接言った方が快いものだ。<br />拙者は万物の音が聞こえる、もちろんお主の声も。
|vo_06_02_rm         = Sessha wa kazarike no nai seikaku wo shita hito ga suki de gozaru. Yahari, omotte iru koto wa kokoro no uchi ni himezu, chokusetsu itta hou ga kokoroyoi mono da.<br />Sessha wa banbutsu no oto ga kikoeru, mochiron onushi no koe mo.
|vo_06_02_tl         = I like plain people. After all I don't hide the feelings in my heart, it's best to just speak directly.<br />I can here the sounds of all creation, and of course your voice as well.

|vo_07_01_title      = 「神の目」について…
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_friendship = 4
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 神の目は力の「根源」ではなく、力の「証明」であると拙者は思う。神の目とは、前へ進みたいと思う人々の願い。拙者たち武士にとってのそれは、いつの日も手中にある刀のみなのでござるよ。
|vo_07_01_rm         = Kami no Me wa chikara no "kongen" de wa naku, chikara no "shoumei" de aru to sessha wa omou. Kami no Me to wa, mae he susumitai to omou hitobito no negai. Sessha-tachi bushi ni totte no sore wa, itsu no hi mo shuchuu ni aru katana nomi na no de gozaru yo.
|vo_07_01_tl         = A vision is not a 'source' of power, I believe its 'proof' of power. Visions are the wishes of people to go forth. For a warrior like me that is nothing more then to hold a katana in my hand.
|vo_07_02_title      = シェアしたいこと・竹刀
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share: Bamboo Blades
|vo_07_02_friendship = 4
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share - Bamboo Blades.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 剣術を学びたいなら…ふむ、これを持つとよい。先ほど作った竹刀でござる。これで打ち合えば、傷を負わずに済むであろう。
|vo_07_02_rm         = Kenjutsu wo manabitai nara... fumu, kore wo motsu to yoi. Sakihodo tsukutta shinai de gozaru. Kore de uchiaeba, kizu wo owazu ni sumu de arou.
|vo_07_02_tl         = If you want to learn swordsmanship... hmm, we should wait one this. We should use bamboo swords. Then if we fight we won't sustain any injuries.
|vo_07_03_title      = シェアしたいこと・カエデ
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Something to Share: Maple Leaves
|vo_07_03_friendship = 4
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share - Maple Leaves.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = 「奥山に、紅葉踏み分け、鳴く鹿の、声聞くときぞ、秋は悲しき」…拙者はカエデが好きでござる。しかし、カエデが紅に変わる時は、いつも別れが伴う…
|vo_07_03_rm         = "Okuyama ni, momiji fumiwake, naku shika no, koe kiku toki zo, aki wa kanashiki"... Sessha wa kaede ga suki de gozaru. Shikashi, kaede ga aka ni kawaru toki wa, itsumo wakare ga tomonau...
|vo_07_03_tl         = 'When you hear the voice of a deer through the autumn colors of the mountain recesses, autumn is sorrow'... I like maple leaves. However their turning red always comes with a parting of ways...
|vo_07_04_title      = 興味のあること…
|vo_07_04_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_04_tx         = カモメよ、鳴くでない。今日から拙者も同じく、漂流者なのだぞ。
|vo_07_04_rm         = Kamome yo, naku de nai. Kyou kara sessha mo onajiku, hyouryuusha na no da zo.
|vo_07_04_tl         = Gulls, do not cry. From today on we are the same, wanderers adrift.

|vo_08_01_title      = 北斗について…
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Beidou]]
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Beidou.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 北斗の姉君は拙者の恩人。稲妻から逃げ出した拙者を、姉君が引き取ってくれた。拙者が一番苦心していた時期に、稲妻へ戻る勇気をくれたのだ。彼女は、拙者と周りにいるすべての船員が背中を任せられる戦友なのでござる。
|vo_08_01_rm         = Hokuto no anegimi wa sessha no onjin. Inazuma kara nigedashita sessha wo, anegimi ga hikitotte kureta. Sessha ga ichiban kushin shite ita jiki ni, Inazuma he modoru yuuki wo kureta no da. Kanojo wa, sessha to mawari ni iru subete no sen'in ga senaka wo makaserareru sen'yuu na no de gozaru.
|vo_08_01_tl         = Beidou has done much for me. She helped me escape Inazuma, then took me back. She gave me the courage to return to Inazuma in those painful times. Me and all the sailors around me have become comrades who watch each other backs.
|vo_08_02_title      = ゴローについて…
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Gorou]]
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Gorou.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 拙者が指名手配されていた時、抵抗軍が拙者を助けてくれたのでござる。ゴローとはその時の短い付き合いであったが、彼のことは深く印象に残っている。彼は言いたいことを真っ直ぐに言う性格で、部下と共に喜びや悲しみを分かち合い、友のために犠牲をいとわない。だから拙者は、彼とは気が合うのでござるよ。
|vo_08_02_rm         = Sessha ga shimeitehai sarete ita toki, Teikougun ga sessha wo tasukete kureta no de gozaru. Gorou to wa sono toki no mijikai tsukiai de atta ga, kare no koto wa fukaku inshou ni nokotte iru. Kare wa iitai koto wo massugu ni iu seikaku de, buka to tomo ni yorokobi ya kanashimi wo wakachiai, tomo no tame ni gisei wo itowanai. Dakara sessha wa, kare to wa ki ga au no de gozaru yo.
|vo_08_02_tl         = The resistance army saved me when I was wanted. I was only with Gorou for a short time but, he left a deep impression on me. He says what he wants to say and has a straightforward personality, he shares both joys and sorrows with his subordinates, he wouldn't hesitate to sacrifice himself for them.  And so I got along well with him.
|vo_08_03_title      = 九条裟羅について・態度
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Kujou Sara]]
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kujou Sara.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 御前試合で拙者の友人を負かした彼女の実力は認めているでござる。しかし、それほどまでの力を悪行に使い、九条軍を率いて「神の目」を回収するなど、拙者は決して許さぬ。
|vo_08_03_rm         = Gozenjiai de sessha no yuujin wo makashita kanojo no jitsuryoku wa mitomete iru de gozaru. Shikashi, sore hodo made no chikara wo akugyou ni tsukai, Kujou-gun wo hikiite "Kami no Me" wo kaishuu suru nado, sessha wa kesshite yurusanu.
|vo_08_03_tl         = I recognized her true strength during the duel my friend lost. However I will never forgive use of such power for evil, such as the kujou armies collection of 'visions'.
|vo_08_04_title      = 九条裟羅について・見直し
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About Kujou Sara: Changing Perspective
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_quest      = Omnipresence Over Mortals
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kujou Sara - Changing Perspective.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = なるほど…どうやら彼女は自らの信念があったのだな。ただこの一件が終わったあと、「九条」家の繁栄がこの先も続くかどうかは不明であるが。
|vo_08_04_rm         = Naruhodo... dou yara kanojo wa mizukara no shinnen ga atta no da na. Tada kono ikken ga owatta ato, "Kujou"-ke no han'ei ga kono saki mo tsudzuku ka dou ka wa fumei de aru ga.
|vo_08_04_tl         = I see... It seems she had great conviction in herself. This incident has just ended, it is still unclear if the kujou house will continue to prosper.
|vo_08_05_title      = 雷電将軍について…
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About the [[Raiden Shogun]]
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_quest      = Autumn Winds, Scarlet Leaves
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Raiden Shogun.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = 稲妻を離れた後、何度も自分の胸に聞いたでござる。雷電将軍に対する拙者の不満は、あの御前試合から生じたものなのか、彼女が友に下した一振りが原因だったのかと。<br />拙者は考えた末、それは違うと分かった。拙者の友は決闘の場で堂々と死した、雷電将軍のあの一振りは間違っていたとは言えぬ。彼女に対する不満は、「目狩り令」からくるものだ。何人たりとも他人の願いを剥奪する資格などない、たとえそれが「神」であったとしても。
|vo_08_05_rm         = Inazuma wo hanareta nochi, nando mo jibun no mune ni kiita de gozaru. Raiden Shougun ni taisuru sessha no fuman wa, ano gozenjiai kara shoujita mono na no ka, kanojo ga tomo ni kudashita hitofuri ga gen'in datta no ka to.<br />Sessha wa kangaeta sue, sore wa chigau to wakatta. Sessha no tomo wa kettou no ba de doudou to shishita, Raiden Shougun no ano hitofuri wa machigatte ita to wa ienu. Kanojo ni taisuru fuman wa, "Megari-rei" kara kuru mono da. Nanpito tari to mo tanin no negai wo hakudatsu suru shikaku nado nai, tatoe sore ga "kami" de atta to shite mo.
|vo_08_05_tl         =
